address: Xã Hoằng Thái, Huyện Hoằng Hóa, Tỉnh Thanh Hóa
thought:
**Determining the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Hoằng Thái"**

Okay, so the user is looking for the new administrative unit for "Xã Hoằng Thái, Huyện Hoằng Hóa, Tỉnh Thanh Hóa". My thinking goes like this: first, I need to isolate the old province and ward names.  Easy enough: "Xã Hoằng Thái" and "Tỉnh Thanh Hóa".

Next, I have to check for any province mergers. Luckily, the "60-NQ/TW" document clearly states that "Tỉnh Thanh Hóa" remains unchanged. Good, one less thing to worry about.

Now, the real work begins: finding out what happened to "Xã Hoằng Thái".  I'll scour the "Other resolutions" for its name. Ah, there it is! Resolution `1686/NQ-UBTVQH15` sheds some light.  It looks like "Xã Hoằng Thái", along with several other wards, has been merged into a new ward called "Xã Hoằng Lộc".

Following that thread, I need to confirm that "Xã Hoằng Lộc" actually exists as a new unit. I'll check the "New wards" list for "Xã Hoằng Lộc", and there it is, with its ward code and province clearly listed. Excellent.

Given the explicit nature of the merger mentioned in the resolution and the verification in the `New wards` list, I have a high degree of confidence in this answer.  Time to construct the JSON output and provide the user with the correct information!

citation.header: 1686/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Thanh Hóa
citation.line: 22. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Hoằng Thịnh, Hoằng Thái, Hoằng Thành, Hoằng Trạch, Hoằng Tân và Hoằng Lộc thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Hoằng Lộc.
